title: Deutsche Bank wins "Wealth Manager of the Year" in Financial Times awards
body:
Deutsche Bank won “Wealth Manager of the Year” in the Financial Times Investment and Wealth Management Awards 2016, after Financial Times and Investors Chronicle readers commended its ability to offer clients a tailored personal service along with the sophisticated range of solutions offered by the global bank.
The wealth manager scored highly in a survey of mainly UK-based readers for its “boutique-like approach” to client service, combined with “easy access” to asset management, markets and investment banking expertise, such as customised loans and foreign exchange capabilities, according to the awards supplement by the publications.
Deutsche Bank also won the award for Best Discretionary/Advisory Wealth Manager.
